name: TransForms (concept)
description:
How does being transgender impact someone? In many ways; socially, emotionally, expressively, medically, and so on. It's a complex assortment of situations and factors, and it's hard to explain everything concisely.

So I want to build a short game using gameplay mechanics as analogy for the situations they come across. This is a first draft of such a game. Yes, it's very hamfisted and janky and more 'tell' than 'show' right now. But I hope it can be of value to someone anyway.

Made with Gamemaker, uses only a handful of sprites so should run on any PC. A single *.exe file for convenience.

Controls:
-arrow keys
-space
-escape
